message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm asking for $18,000. I'm confident you'll find this a fair price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $15,000. This is my final offer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose an offer of $12,000.
